title: TansSlo – Sustainable Transport Research
segmentation: Good morning, can you say time good afternoon ladies and gentlemen, I try to be short.
The finish on time.
Or the presentation will.
The overview of the transfer project and transport research priorities and draft Rd Maps of National Transport Research agenda.
Coordinator of the Transfer Project is Slovenia control.
The following partners.
Ministry of Transport of Republic of Slovenia.

It looks like technical Association of Slovenia Neural Center for Research at Newcastle University and we found out that it's very important to help on board to experienced partner which neural certainly is.
Translate wishes to thank also to DG Research and particularly to support of Mrs Susana Martins for help and Susana Martinez is the transfer project technical office.
Transflo is designed to increase the participation of Slovenia in the field of transport research and the integration of Slovenia in so-called European research are.
The transfer project has focused on.
With three main actions organizing context of the best PhD studies in the field of transport.
The best of which was presented during the Slovenia, and I said 2007 conference.
To organize the transfer workshop.

Setting up a database of companies, research institutes, organizations and universities involved in transport research, mapping the areas of strength, weaknesses, and needs of civilian transport research.
By carrying out these actions, there is a strong interaction with the processes of update and further development of Slovenian national transport policy and national transport research plan.
To define Slovenian research capabilities following survey techniques was used.
We send out more than 400 question are we got a little bit less than 200 replies?
Database for researchers and research organizations.
Web inquiry transload workshop digital voting.
Trans Global Shop best practice examples and Slovenian involvement in FP6 projects.
Love you with the help of noon.
Another experience, the specialist, the transfer activities result in a workshop.

They are all national subject active in surface transport, research, utilization and industry, communicated and worked together in order to find solutions and research priorities for topical transport and logistic problems.
I'd like to show 2 examples of digital voting session at Transload Workshop.
One of the question was over the next 20 years.
What will be the main drivers for the improvement in intermodal?
Freight.
49% asked for improved rail freight services and 44% development of intermodal junctions.
One more example about which industry has the biggest role to play.
In increasing the use of the environmentally friendly transport mode.
For the eight answered rail and 42 automotive.
Next few slides will show the results from interactive session.
For Slovenian research priorities baseline was five euro priorities.
The Greening of surface transport encouraging model shift ensuring sustainable urban mobility, improving safety and security, and strengthening competitiveness.
The results of the interactive session illustrated the Slovenian research priorities of the workshop audience, and.
As follow.
The priorities for Greening of surface Transport Pennsylvania showed that nearly half the audience felt that the priority was to develop technologies for clean power and to reduce emission.
There was a large gap between the priority in the next most important priority which was having environmental friendly and efficient industrial process.

And you avoid the topic of concerns is how to encourage Mother ship and it is felt that the priorities for encouraging model shift in Slovenia would be facilitated by improving the interfaces between transport modes in both the passenger and freight services.
A further concern for the development of National Research agendas.
Is the subject with system is the subject of sustainability?
Respondents were asked the priorities for ensuring sustainable urban mobility in Slovenia.
The overall response was for new mobility concept for passengers and Accessibility for all with intelligent mobility system and multimodal interfaces.
Safety and security are issues for go.
Messenger, then flight operators and it was filled.
An important issue to rise if the experts in the audience in terms of improving safety and security of transport in Slovenia.
There was a clear, clear agreement that the integration of safety and security.
For surface transport system was the highest priority closely followed.
By safety and security by design.
A change in the voting priorities came with the issue of strengthening competitiveness.

The responses were split between providing advanced and cost effective infrastructure construction, maintenance and monitoring, improving competitive services products and services and developing more innovative product concepts.
Translate was pleased to discover that the final question concerning the priorities of cross cutting activities in Slovenia had promoted the involvement of Slovenia in European research.
As the main concern, this was closely followed by stimulating participation of small and medium enterprises.
Which is in fact the key factor and stimulation of international cooperation.
This further validated that object use of the transfer project and use a good foundation for the development of the national transport agenda.
How big?
The Ministry of Transport proposed some strategic research teams.
Which could be seen on the left side of the slide.
Transfer being grouped with the strategic activities of the European Commission, which is seen on the right side.
It can be seen that popular priority areas of Slovenia are Greening and the competitiveness to produce the Slovenian National Transport Research Agenda following Rd Maps were proposed.
For Slovenia, the key target is to develop technologies for clean power and reduce emission, which will also support research to support action on climate change.
The reduced emission also means to reduce pollution.
Which is a priority to safeguard the health of citizens?
Lavinia will contribute to her European cooperative research to improve the cleanest and energy efficiency of power and promote the use of alternative fuels, including hydrogen and fuel cells.

A clear priority in Slovenia is that the congestion of transport corridors and van strategic for this is to improve model shift and therefore the priority is to improve the interfaces between transport mode for both passenger and freight services.
This can be achieved.
By integrated planning for transport in the future, taking into account effect to Inter modality especially for road and rail.
This includes activities in addressing the interoperability and operational optimization of local regional.
National and European Transport network systems and services and their intermodal integration in an integrated approach.
Sylvania focuses on the community when addressing sustainable urban mobility and because of this, passenger were the main consideration and the major safety and security improvements are efficient.
Integrated into the Slovenia transport system.
They will never in the community should always be considered through the prayer.
Priorities.
Are persons such as such as motorbikes, pedestrians, cycle riders.
These issues are common across Europe.
And the emphasis will be placed on.
Integrity approach linking human elements.
Structural integrity, preventive passive and active safety, including monitoring system rescue and crisis management.
Security will be addressed on areas such as aviation, very decent, inherent requirement to the transport system.
In Slovenia, there are two main priorities to be addressed in considering the competitiveness of the transport system.
These are.
Provide affordable transport with them.
Contribution coming from advanced and cost effective transport infrastructure.
No problem improving competitive surface transport services and product.
In fact, this will be placed on innovative and improved product and system concept and improved transport services, ensuring higher customer satisfaction.
All those Rd Maps are supportive from Ministry of Transport.
For Slovenia, it's particularly impor.
To address all transport modes, including aeronautics, the European Commission proposes new topics in various schools and these are grouped by the activities covered in the road Maps.
He expects that needs to be addressed in proposals are environmental impacts of transport and climate change.
Enhanced integration of transport modes, transport system efficiency and competitiveness, and rising awareness of transport research results in Europe.
In front of the room you can find more information about the transfer project.
You can find trans slow, newsletter and CD where transflo workshop book.
Thank you for your attention.
